CONVERSATION GROUP: But please if you can, let me out of here...ever since they put us in here my mind has felt...fuzzy. I can't put my finger on it, but...it doesn't feel right....

BK really modern sounding
You and the guy across the hall clearly have some beef. What's up with that?
Hah! Oh, a little angry!? A saint would go insane from staying in here!

Then not only that, he accuses me of... of... poetry!? Something about the lake, and the stars with some woman... pah! Do I look like the kind of duergar that gives a rat's arse about that kind of nonsense!?
I threatened him to get off my property before I call the guards... but they had already arrived before I set a foot outside my door! Blasted....
Finally, someone that has some sense around here. The bastards have been starving me though...I'll need to rest for a moment. But thanks.
BK Yeah? It'll be a ridiculous one, I bet.
BK Yeah, you do that, brat!
BK Thanks for letting me out. I'll get out on my own.
[The duergar ignores you as you stare into his cell. Maybe he'll be more attentive if you had a way to let him out.]
Hahaha!! Oh, I'm going to enjoy pummeling you down, monster.
